use_case.name: Steam Turbine Bearing & Rotor Blade RUL Prediction
use_case.criticality: High - Direct impact on production, safety, and operational costs
use_case.ai_function: Predict Remaining Useful Life (RUL) of bearings and rotor blades based on vibration, temperature, pressure, and lubrication sensor data.

identified_ai_failure_modes.name: Sensor Data Corruption
identified_ai_failure_modes.description: Corrupted or noisy sensor data (e.g., vibration, temperature) fed into the AI model, leading to inaccurate RUL predictions.

identified_ai_failure_modes.name: Model Drift (False Negatives)
identified_ai_failure_modes.description: AI model's performance degrades over time, consistently underestimating degradation, leading to missed critical maintenance. High RUL_pred when RUL_true is low.

identified_ai_failure_modes.name: Model Drift (False Positives)
identified_ai_failure_modes.description: AI model overestimates degradation, triggering unnecessary maintenance alerts and shutdowns. Low RUL_pred when RUL_true is high.

identified_ai_failure_modes.name: Inference Latency Spike
identified_ai_failure_modes.description: Delays in AI model predictions, causing alerts to be delivered too late for proactive action.

identified_ai_failure_modes.name: Data Pipeline Failure
identified_ai_failure_modes.description: Failure to deliver sensor data to the AI model, resulting in no predictions or stale predictions.

identified_ai_failure_modes.name: Feature Engineering Error
identified_ai_failure_modes.description: Errors in transforming raw sensor data into features for the AI model, leading to poor model performance.

failures.name: Network Latency Spike
failures.description: Delay in data transmission to/from AI service.
